About.title: About me
About.text: I started my developer career in 2018 working as a front-end in an E-commerce development and maintenance company. I worked with the techs: PHP, HTML/CSS, Javascript and Sass, Codeigniter. In early 2021 I started as a fullstack JR developer at a credit analysis company and worked on several projects. I used the techs: PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, NodeJS and ReactJS, AWS, Windows Server, among others... PHP Frameworks: Zend 1, Slim 3, OpenCart 2, Wordpress and mainly Laravel. They ranged from small-scale projects such as Landing pages, to large systems, e-commerce and integrations.
